snippet: Appliance manufacturers are starting to pay attention to the demand for less noise.
abstract: Manufacturers of household machinery, such as dishwashers and washing machines, are also taking heed of the demand for quiet appliances.
lead_paragraph: Appliance manufacturers are starting to pay attention to the demand for less noise.

headline.seo: Appliances That Are Seen and Not Heard
headline.main: Tell the Dishwasher to Be Quiet
headline.print_headline: Tell the Dishwasher to Be Quiet
